snippet: The oath of office took place in a small White House ceremony presided over by Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr., who called Mr. Carter “a thinker and a doer.”
abstract: Ashton B Carter is sworn in as 25th secretary of defense and fourth to serve Obama administration.
lead_paragraph: The oath of office took place in a small White House ceremony presided over by Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr., who called Mr. Carter “a thinker and a doer.”

headline.main: Ashton Carter Sworn In as Secretary of Defense
headline.print_headline: Carter Sworn In as Defense Secretary
